1.5.name: wordpress/randomentries-widget
1.5.description:
RandomEntries Widget is a SEO designed widget that allows you to post entries at random in your sidebar, this improves indexing of your website.

This is the ideal widget for improving SEO as it allows for faster crawling of your websites.

Features:

  • configurable number of displayed records;
  • conclusion quote, or just the title;
  • display in a list or any other form (the tags are set).
